notes.data_completeness: Partial - fllat.com is a Next.js app using React Server Components with client-side hydration. Prices, image URLs, and some amenities are loaded dynamically via JavaScript and are not available in the static HTML/RSC stream. Prices for listings 1-4 were provided by the user from the listing page. Descriptions and features were extracted from detail pages.

api_investigation.result: No public API found. All /api/ endpoints return Next.js RSC HTML or 404. The site does not expose a REST or GraphQL API. Data is server-rendered within React Server Components.
api_investigation.sitemap: https://fllat.com/sitemap.xml exists but only contains US listings (Washington DC, New York). London URLs are NOT in the sitemap.
api_investigation.robots_txt: No disallow rules. Sitemap references only /sitemap.xml. No London-specific sitemap found.

technology_stack.framework: Next.js 13+ with App Router and React Server Components
technology_stack.rendering: Server-side rendering with client-side hydration; listing data embedded in RSC stream not accessible via static fetch
